EmailTemplate.subject: This mobile revolution won’t wait for you…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+Samsung+-+BS+Sweeps+&utm_content=Disengaed+Stream]]> <[[https://images.samsung.com/is/content/samsung/p5/ca/business/next-mobile-economy/NME_Report-7.0.V2US-EN.pdf?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Be Part Of The Next Mobile Economy
Now is the time to embrace change if you want to stay in the game. Discover how mobile phones are vital to the future of your business. Find Out More <[[https://images.samsung.com/is/content/samsung/p5/ca/business/next-mobile-economy/NME_Report-7.0.V2US-EN.pdf?&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+Samsung+-+BS+Sweeps+&utm_content=Disengaed+Stream]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+Samsung+-+BS+Sweeps+&utm_content=Disengaed+Stream]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+Samsung+-+BS+Sweeps+&utm_content=Disengaed+Stream]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+Samsung+-+BS+Sweeps+&utm_content=Disengaed+Stream]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
